page.title: 01SUMMARY OF LOSSIEMOUTH AREA.
page.content: This area of the MORAY FIRTH has a land cover,ranging from the harbour at the rocky foreshore,stretching along golden beaches,to coastal dunes and cliff grassland at the lighthouse. The holiday resort of Lossiemouth is to the east of the area.The population is seven thousand,six hundred and fifty. There are two Primary schools and one High School,also Playing Fields and a Community Centre. There are two eighteen hole golf courses,at the end of which is a holiday caravan park.
